title: Keeling curve - impact of fossil fuels

content.question: Which of the following is most likely a significant cause of the general trend indicated by the graph?

choices.label: Reduction of ozone concentrations in the upper atmosphere
Reduction in size of polar ice caps
Increase in energy output of the Sun
Increase in evaporation of ocean water
Increase in consumption of fossil fuels

content.answer: Increase in consumption of fossil fuels

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about environmental issues.
